Instruction: Rinse rice until the water is clear.
Soak the rice in warm water for 2 to 4 hours. Drain.
Put a steamer insert in a saucepan and add water to just below the bottom of the steamer.
Bring the water to a boil.
Line the steamer with cheese cloth and fill it with rice; steam until fully cooked, approximately 20 minutes.
Take the steamer off the heat and move the rice to a bowl.
Combine coconut milk, sugar, and salt in a saucepan; heat until it simmers.
Pour three-quarters of the coconut milk mixture over the rice; cover the bowl and let it rest for 5 minutes.
Pour the rest of the coconut milk mixture over the rice and add mango slices on top.
